heroSection.description: Slide-Coach AI analyzes your presentations, provides real-time feedback on pronunciation, pacing, and clarity
heroSection.noCardText: No credit card required • Start practicing immediately

videoSection.heading: Practice Like It's Real
videoSection.subheading: Upload your slides, set your duration, and get instant AI-powered feedback on your presentation skills.

features.title: Features
features.scrollAnimationText: Level up your pitch with AI-led mock sessions and instant insights—seamlessly

featuresSection.heading: Why We {highlight}?
featuresSection.subheading: Slide-Coach empowers you with AI-driven practice, Q&A, and feedback—so every presentation is your best one yet.

upload.title: Slide Upload & Setup
upload.description: Easily upload your PPT or PDF and set your speaking duration so Slide-Coach knows how to simulate your real presentation.

mockSession.title: AI-Powered Mock Session
mockSession.description: Practice your presentation slide-by-slide. The AI times you, guides you, and creates a real-world mock environment.

interactiveQA.title: Interactive AI Q&A
interactiveQA.description: After presenting, engage in an AI-led Q&A based on your slides—get asked context-aware questions just like a live audience.

timing.title: Real-Time Timing Feedback
timing.description: Receive live pacing data during practice. Know if you’re ahead, behind, or right on track to finish on time.

feedback.title: Comprehensive AI Feedback
feedback.description: Get detailed insights on pronunciation, filler words, clarity, and slide engagement so you know exactly where to improve.

presenter.title: Ideal for Any Presenter
presenter.description: Whether you’re a student defending a thesis, a job candidate in an interview, or a professional pitching a client, Slide‑Coach has you covered.

timeline.heading: How it
timeline.subheading: A simple step-by-step guide to using our service. Scroll down to learn more about each step in detail.

upload.title: Upload Your File
upload.description: Upload your pdf or ppt files to Slide Coach

presentation.title: Give Your Presentation
presentation.description: Give your presentation within the allotted time

pricing.heading: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subheading: Choose the perfect plan for your needs. Always know what you'll pay.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for individuals and small projects

pro.name: Professional
pro.description: Ideal for growing businesses and teams

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large organizations with complex needs

endingHero.heading: Ready to Master Presentations
endingHero.subheading: Start using Slide-Coach today to perfect your slides, gain confidence, and deliver your best presentation every time.
endingHero.note: No credit card required • 14-day free trial • Cancel anytime
